projects.name: Archivio
projects.description: Archivio is an archiving and documentation application that allows you to archive posts quickly andsynchronize project documentation from your actual code to the documentation page.

projects.name: Vladmir
projects.description: Vladmir is a goaltracking app I am working on to collect data and manage my own personal goals I set for myself

projects.name: NSBE Career Fair Filter
projects.description: This is a NSBE Career Fair filtering application I made to ease the process of finding which companies are worth student's time to visit by filtering for what they are looking for.

projects.name: Webpage Capture
projects.description: Webpage Capture is a chrome extension that allows you to take screenshots of your current working tab and manage your collection of screenshots.
